entry.title: Just A Reporter
entry.summary:
Author: BlossomingBitch_15

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,012Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 20

Summary: “Excited, Mr. Klent? It’s not every night someone gets to play with me.”The top of Clark’s ears and the back of his neck burn. He’s taken on a more slouched posture than usual to try and hide the beginnings of the erection he has growing in his pants. The other guests in the corridor seem drawn to them, more and more eyes turning their way. Everyone recognizes Brucie and what their (Clark’s) flustered appearance means.“Mr. Wayne, I don’t think such a public area is the sort of place for this kind of talk.” Clark admonishes shakily. Admittedly, he’s not currently entirely motivated to succeed in getting Bruce’s rampant flirting under control.Or: Clark finally hits his breaking point with Bruce's alter ego, Brucie. The teasing and flirting can only make up for so much of Brucie's annoying personality. It's a good thing Clark loves his friend so much.

entry.title: Sweet Dreams
entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,998Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 15

Summary: Batman finds himself caught by an old foe who comes back for revenge. Trapped in a world where everything he dreams was true seems to be real, things he long tucked away begin to resurface. He knows deep down that this world isn’t real, but it’s hard to let go of something so, so good.Superman grows distraught when his best friend goes missing. He must find him and stop whatever new evil has taken Batman while he and the rest of the League weren’t watching. But will Batman be the same after this? Will he bounce back this time, as he had all those times before? Regardless, Superman will be there to make sure his friend is okay.ORA solo-mission-gone-wrong leaves Bruce trapped in a world that seems too good to be true until Superman breaks him free. Now he must pick up the pieces of himself he once tried so hard to tuck away.

entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,506Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 241

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,990Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 153

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: A Hero's Escort
entry.summary:
Author: Aquariousity01

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,000Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Liam Reilly is just trying to get through his double majors in Criminal Justice and Psychology at Gotham City University, against his parents' wishes. Since he can't rely on them for support, he has to turn to one of the few ways of making money in Gotham City to be able to pay for his tuition and everything else. And since he refuses to be a criminal, Liam creates an account on a website called Rent-a-Date, a high end escort service for the world's richest and for people like Liam to make arrangements for everything for meeting for a meal, a night in Vegas, sex, etc.Liam's world is thrown into chaos when he agrees to a date with a user known as Mr_M0n3y_B@g$$95, who turns out to be none other than genius playboy philanthropist Bruce Wayne. Liam is thrust into the thick of a world of heroes and villains when his latent metagene awakens. But he isn't opposed to having a little fun along the way, especially if there's money involved (bonus points if its enough for more books).

entry.title: 𝑪𝑳𝑶𝑺𝑬 𝑸𝑼𝑨𝑹𝑻𝑬𝑹𝑺 // 𝑨 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑩𝑨𝑻 𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑹𝒀
entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,057Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Bruce Wayne is no stranger to the spotlight—or the shadows it casts. Reclusive, haunted by tragedy, and heir to a name that carries more weight than comfort, he now faces something far more personal than public scrutiny: a stalker. The letters arrive like clockwork—taunting, obsessive, familiar. And with Halloween approaching—the anniversary of his parents' death—the tension coils tighter.Clark Kent is a disciplined, quietly intense MMA-trained security specialist, brought in under General Sam Lane’s orders to keep Bruce safe. He expects a job. He doesn’t expect the gothic cold of Wayne Manor, the brooding silence of its only resident, or the unsettling depth of what Bruce refuses to say out loud.But as danger creeps closer, and the mystery surrounding the stalker sharpens, Bruce and Clark are forced into uncomfortable proximity. What begins as resistance slowly becomes something deeper—something fragile and real.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,455Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 11

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what would’ve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

entry.title: Operation: Get Dad a Life (and Accidentally a League of Lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: SamLikesToRead

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,866Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 147

Summary: The Justice League thinks they’re dating Batman.The Batfamily thinks they’re just setting Bruce up with new friends.Bruce thinks he’s having a mental breakdown.One global crisis, several accidental dates, and many overheard “Dad”s later, everyone slowly realizes they’re in love.(Except Bruce. He realizes last.)A chaotic love story starring oblivious bats, nosy kids, and one very confused League.
